summary: Allows for creation of Falmer Armor and Weapons at forges.
descriptionHtml:
======================
.:: MAIN DESCRIPTION ::.
======================
Version 1.2 Released! - Now Forge Falmer Bows and Supple Falmer Bows!
-Removed Version 1.1

NOTICE: ONCE DAWNGUARD IS RELEASED FOR PC, I PLAN ON ADDING A VERSION TO ADD HEAVY AND HARDENED FALMER ARMOR. CHECK BACK SHORTLY AFTER RELEASE!

Adds the following Falmer Items to forges:

Falmer Helmet
Falmer Armor
Falmer Gauntlets
Falmer Boots
Falmer Shield
Falmer Sword
Falmer War Axe
Falmer Bow
Honed Falmer Sword
Honed Falmer War Axe
Supple Falmer Bow

The main ingredient for Falmer items is Charus Chitin.
-Honed and Supple items require a Steel Ingot.
Falmer Items require the Elven Smithing Perk to be created.
---
To have access to Falmer Arrows, please download my Fletching at Forges mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18700/
---
Prefer your Falmer armor \"light\" instead of \"heavy\"? Check out this \"Falmer Armor Light\" mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9532
author: FlapjacksNsyrup
